description: This is a template for exalted literature (hard cover).

Breen Exalted Media was a highly praised publisher providing exalted philosophical literature about the higher meaning of life itself.  These books offer insights in the deepest depths of our soul and always deliver uplifting "turgidity".
A messianic entity from the future travels to modern-day earth to wipe out 300,000,000 "bad people" and usher in a new era of peace.
Identical twin brothers become hybrid artificial intelligence entities, yet torn in different directions to achieve justice for humanity.
A computer-scientist/novelist reunites with his childhood friend, hacks into government databases, and faces the dire and fateful consequences of the mystical actions he obtained as a child.

name.str_pl: copies of I Am Here... Now

description: Disappointed by its creation, the almighty being that created Man arrives on Earth in a human form and interacts with various troubled, wicked and sinful people on his journey to Vegas.
A brilliant computer loner seizes Las Vegas and its terrorist attack, while fighting against his fits of clinical depression and obsession for romance and death.

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about the great Dingus stream and all the wonders he encounters while flowing through the country.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'D'.

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about the evolution of the human hand and all the goals humans we can achieve thanks to this.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'F'.

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about an aging hag and the ways her life changes through the centuries.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'H'.

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about a broken ladder and a family of snakes, fixing it.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'L'.

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about a professional cleaner and all the issues he's confronted with while cleaning public restrooms.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'T'.  In the lower left corner on the cover page an imprint says "This edition was sponsored by the 'Council of Public Utilities Commissioners, New England'"

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about the famous "Bee's Wiener" and why eating meat is essential for a young body.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'W'.  In the lower left corner on the cover page an imprint says "This edition was sponsored by 'Sysco & Bee Meat(TM) Farms Co., New England'"

A tiny book for tiny readers, telling a story about a lonely zombie and the troubles he goes through, trying to collect flowers for the love of his (un)life.  This colorful book belongs to a serie, dedicated to the letters of the alphabet.  This one is devoted to the letter 'Z'.
